name: Clockwork (itch) (googlypoo)
description:
Use the power of time to outmaneuver denizens of the night. In Clockwork, your hand of cards will grow stronger and larger every 10 seconds. Be careful, though, as monsters move and attack at this pace as well!

Controls

  • Mouse only
  • Click on a card to play it

Tools

  • Game engine: Unity
  • Vector graphics: Figma
  • Raster graphics: Gimp
  • Sound: Audacity

Made in 48 hours for the Ludum Dare 51 Compo, my second Ludum Dare.
